rows.label: tlk43320142_02_msg0001
rows.name:
The kids are playing
at being Mercs again.

rows.label: tlk43320142_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Seems like they're getting
pretty good at all the details
of handling weapons too now.

rows.label: tlk43320142_02_msg0004
rows.name:
He always had a bit of a spark,
but it's really showing now.

rows.label: tlk43320142_02_msg0005
rows.name:
I hope it doesn't get him
into trouble someday...
